name: gitlab
description: GitLab is a comprehensive DevOps platform that includes Git hosting, CI/CD, security scanning, and project management. The FOSS edition allows self-hosting with an extensive web UI and API for enterprise workflows.
features: Complete DevOps Platform: Unified platform for source control, CI/CD, security, and deployment management.
Advanced CI/CD: Build, test, and deploy with powerful pipelines, runners, and deployment strategies.
Security Scanning: Integrated SAST, DAST, dependency scanning, and container scanning for vulnerability detection.
Project Management: Plan work with issues, epics, milestones, and agile boards in one interface.
Code Review: Merge requests with inline comments, approval rules, and code quality reports.
Container Registry: Built-in Docker registry with vulnerability scanning and cleanup policies.
Wiki and Documentation: Maintain project documentation with integrated wiki and pages.
Enterprise Features: LDAP integration, audit logs, compliance frameworks, and advanced permissions.
